title: FS: T206 Willetts w/ Polar Bear Back
author: jtschantz

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Willetts w/ Polar Bear Back
posts.post_content:
$30 Through Paypal delivered
Willetts 4mk Polar Bear
If interested, email at [url]joel.tschantz@savageandassociates.com[/url]]

nice looking card, but where's the mark?
--S
Heck if I know..I was going to say in the description that I can't see it but I thought someone would spot it right away...I really don't know why it got a MK

Is there any way to ask PSA where they spotted a mark?  I recently bought a PSA 6MK cause it was the price of a 4 and presents beautifully, and when it arrived couldn't for the life of me find the mark.  I'd be curious to know where they saw a mark, or else submit it for re-grading.
they probably counted one of the tobacco stains as the mk...:confused:
Maybe they thought the 2 vertical lines in the background under his left elbow were the marks.  Are those supposed to be there (part of background)?
If you look in the solid blue ink area between "Assorted Designs" and the factory line there appears to be a possible "P" and some other letters "SE".
The card is sold...its now Larrys duty to find the MK and report back!
